uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591

Class Share

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591.Share

  • public class Share
extends java.lang.Object
    Share.java represents one stock market share in the company. the class is an implementation of the multiple design pattern. means (1 private constructor 2 static method and 3 static variable to keep the track)
